feed.title: BIP draft: Extended block header hardfork

entry.title: BIP draft: Extended block header hardfork
entry.summary: In a communication on the Bitcoin-dev mailing list, Tom Zander asks for clarification about where a certain rule is enforced in Bitcoin's code. Jean-Paul responds, suggesting that Tom has gaps in his knowledge of Bitcoin and recommends he visit the Reddit forum, r/BitcoinBeginners, to learn more. In subsequent emails within the thread, other members of the mailing list provide specific information to answer Tom's question about where a certain rule is enforced in the Bitcoin code.
